setup.heading: Set up your account
setup.description: We just need a few more details.

error.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.

qualificationQuestionOne.heading: How familiar are you with alternative investments?

options.one: I have never invested in alternative assets but have a fair understanding of them
options.two: I have some experience in alternative investments with a good understanding of them
options.three: I am well-experienced in alternative investments

qualificationQuestionTwo.heading: What is the total value of your investments in alternative assets?

text.eligible: , your answer will determine your eligibility to certain investments.

errors.notQualified: Our platform is currently limited to qualified investors only.
errors.notAccredited: Our platform is currently limited to accredited investors only.

options.one: I have a minimum of SR5 million in net assets, excluding my principal residence.
options.two: I carried out at least 10 transactions per quarter over the last 12 months with a minimum of SR40 million in the securities market.
options.three: I worked for at least three years in the financial sector in a position related to investment in securities.
options.four: I hold a professional certificate accredited by a recognized entity.
options.five: I hold the CME-1 certification and had an annual income of not less SR600,000 in the last two years.
options.six: I am a client of a Capital Market Institution authorized by the Authority to conduct managing activities, provided that the following is fulfilled: <0><1>a.</1> The offer shall be made to the Capital Market Institution, and that all related communications be made by it.</0> <2><3>b.</3> The Capital Market Institution has been appointed on terms which enable it to make investment decisions on the clientâ€™s behalf without obtaining prior approval from the client.</2>
options.seven: I am a registered person of a Capital Market Institution if the offer is carried out by the Capital Market Institution itself.

options.one: <0>Individual</0>, with a minimum net worth of $1 million in assets, excluding the principal place of residence.
options.two: <0>Legal entity</0>, with a minimum of $1 million in assets available for investment.
options.three: <0>State organization</0>, such as a Government, supranational organization, central bank or other national monetary authority.
